articles.author: Dan Milmo
articles.title: Microsoft's Bing chatbot to offer users answers in three different tones - The Guardian
articles.description: Users asking questions to be given option of ‘creative’, ‘balanced’ or ‘precise’ response
articles.content:
Microsofts Bing chatbot is offering replies in three different tones as it seeks to address some criticisms of the service.
The search engines chatbot, powered by the same technology behind ChatGPT,… [+2534 chars]
